title: Ku and Su Du the EU
itunes:title: Ku and Su Du the EU
description:
This episode is the first time Ku and Su are back on mic since Ku returned from Italy. As we know, SuChin was in Paris not so long ago. So the two talk about their separate trips to Europe. Add to Carters, they could not be more different – we’re swinging from broom closet to bougie. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Before heading to Italy, Ku went to see Sarah Silverman’s new play The Bedwetter 
  • Once in Italy, she and Scott stayed at St. Regis Hotels Rome, Venice, and Florence using their Marriott Bonvoy points. 
  • Ku didn’t do a ton of shopping in Italy, except at the oldest apothecary (from 1221!!) the Officina Profumo Farmaceutica di Santa Maria Novella in Florence. There she bought gift for her friends, including SuChin and Claire
    • For Claire, she gifted: The most delicious Hand cream Claire has ever smelled and a lot of great swag
    • For Su, she gifted: Iris Toothpaste, Mouthwash and a Verbena Milk Soap
    • For both she gifted: Acqua di S.M.Novella Elisir 
  • Kulap’s favorite coffee shop in Rome was Sant 'Eustachio Il Caffè
  • SuChin rode a Lime scooter into Paris from her hotel, 3 hours away. (Just kidding) One of her favorite secrets from Paris is jewelry from Justine Clenquet.
  • Check out Revela’s new Brow Serum to help with eyebrow regrowth!

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
